Overseer

Overseer is a tool to manage martial arts tournament participants.

}

Overseer manages all activities of a martial arts tournament on the day of the event, from weigh-in to assigning fighters to mats.

}

Divisions chosen to run are selected and assigned to mats, issuing the brackets to mat workers, who can then access them and run bouts.

}

As each fighter's final weight is entered, the brackets for their registered divisions are automatically updated.
